item.title: How New York Police Officers Avoid Drunk Driving Charges
item.description: Officers in New York State crashed their official vehicles, hit other motorists and arrived to work reeking of alcohol. And yet, they sometimes evaded...

item.title: How We Obtained 10,000 Police Disciplinary Records
item.description: The New York Times and New York Focus gathered thousands of files from around half of New York State’s nearly 500 law enforcement agencies.

item.title: Israel Orders Evacuation of Gaza City, and Congress Releases Epstein Birthday Notes
item.description: Plus, the fight for control of Fox News.

item.title: The Forces Behind Nepal’s Explosive Gen Z Protests: What to Know
item.description: It was a recent ban on social media that brought young people to the streets, but they came filled with grievances that have built up over years.

item.title: ASML to Invest $1.5 Billion in Mistral, the French A.I. Start-Up
item.description: ASML, the Dutch maker of semiconductor equipment, is investing about $1.5 billion in Mistral, the French A.I. start-up.
